mapper.sql: SELECT t1.`ATTENDANCESETTINGSID`, t1.`ATTENDANCESETTINGSNAME`, t1.`ATTENDENCESETUPID`, t11.`ATTENDENCESETUPNAME`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DKFS`, t31.`ORMORGID`, t11.`ORMORGID` AS `ORMORGID2`, t21.`ZZDZS` AS `ORMORGNAME2`, t31.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t41.`SHORTNAME` AS `ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t1.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`YGBH`, t31.`YGZT`, t51.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_ATTENDANCESETTINGS` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ATTENDENCESETUP t11 ON t1.ATTENDENCESETUPID = t11.ATTENDENCESETUPID LEFT JOIN T_ORG t21 ON t11.ORMORGID = t21.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t31 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t31.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t41 ON t31.ORMORGSECTORID = t41.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORG t51 ON t31.ORMORGID = t51.ORGID

SELECT t1.ATTENDANCESETTINGSID, t1.ATTENDANCESETTINGSNAME, t1.ATTENDENCESETUPID, t11.ATTENDENCESETUPNAME, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.DKFS, t31.ORMORGID, t11.ORMORGID AS ORMORGID2, t21.ZZDZS AS ORMORGNAME2, t31.ORMORGSECTORID, t41.SHORTNAME AS ORMORGSECTORNAME, t1.PIMPERSONID, t1.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.YGBH, t31.YGZT, t51.ZZDZS FROM T_ATTENDANCESETTINGS t1 LEFT JOIN T_ATTENDENCESETUP t11 ON t1.ATTENDENCESETUPID = t11.ATTENDENCESETUPID LEFT JOIN T_ORG t21 ON t11.ORMORGID = t21.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t31 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t31.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t41 ON t31.ORMORGSECTORID = t41.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORG t51 ON t31.ORMORGID = t51.ORGID

select * from V_ATTENDANCESETTINGS_FYGZZKQ t1 WHERE ormorgid2 in ( SELECT t.orgid FROM t_srforg t WHERE instr(t.levelcode, ( select a.levelcode from t_srforg a where a.orgid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID')} ))=1 )

select * from V_ATTENDANCESETTINGS_YGSZKQ t1 WHERE ormorgid2 in ( SELECT t.orgid FROM t_srforg t WHERE instr(t.levelcode, ( select a.levelcode from t_srforg a where a.orgid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID')} ))=1 )
